allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore: Add .gitkeep to track empty dto directories

Added .gitkeep files to the subdirectories within the dto folder to ensure Git tracks these currently empty directories.
Also, tracking the .claude directory for project-specific settings.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "feat: 更新通过 openapi codegen 生成的 schema 和 apis

使用 openapi-generator-maven-plugin 插件根据 openapi/swagger.yaml 文件生成了新的 controller 层代码和相关的 DTOs。

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
Bash(git commit -m "docs: 添加包含项目设置说明的 README.md")
